alert.note: Alert for Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 3:27AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gilmer, southern Murray, south central Whitfield and northern Gordon Counties through 430 AM EDT... At 326 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Tilton, or 9 miles south of Dalton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Calhoun, Ellijay, East Ellijay, Resaca, Carters, Talona, Tails Creek, Redbud, Tilton, Audubon, Sugar Valley, Oakman, Nickelsville and Roundtop. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for north central and northwestern Georgia.
